title: Fantasia Film Festival (1996)
description:
The Fantasia Film Festival is a yearly Genre Film Festival organized in MontrÃƒÂ©al.

It focuses mostly on foreign films of all kind, for more info, read either link below.
 <a href="
http://www.fantasiafestival.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.fantasiafestival.com/</a> <a href="
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fantasia_Festival" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fantasia_Festival</a>

1996 was the first year of the festival and the smallest with only 57 movies presented. I have managed to gather 54 of them and they are here for your enjoyment!

Ultraman! (This could be a tv series or some such, I tried to figure it out and it gave me a headache...)

***Disclaimers***

Tracking down some of these movies was quite hard and thefore, the files are in all kinds of formats and encoded with probably every type of codec known to man. All files work for me, if a movie doesn't work for you, get a better codecs packs and/or a better video player.

I have renamed every folder and almost every file name to make it easier to browse on your computer AND your media streamer. In doing so, I have had to remove numerous tags and shit in folder and file names. I know some original uploaders genuinely care about having their tags on their rips, if you are one of those, I apologize.

The "tt0012345" tags next to title names are IMDB ids. Go to imdb.com, add that shit to the end of the url and you can find the movie description and shit. It also makes my torrent much easier to find on google and all.

As a bonus, this torrent includes pictures of the movie description from the original fantasia guide. It's in french only, if you don't need it, don't download it.

There WILL be mistakes or problems with files, I did my best them to sort through shit and make sure it works as best as possible but mistakes will slip through. If you spot shit, leave a comment or send me an email at:
